post:
For a short time, enjoy a 12 month recurring discount on all our services from shared hosting to our VPS plans. Use code "**Omen40**" at checkout to get 40% off all orders including additional IP's (excludes shared and VPS mini plans).
We are adding an additional 50GB free to the first 25 VPS' purchased also.

**KVM VPS**
 With a HostDoc KVM VPS, you get; 

  Choice of deployable locations.
  Full root access. 
  Virtualizor Control Panel. 
  Weekly backup & Incremental backup's 3 times per week. 
  One snapshot restore per month. 
  KVM Virtualization. 
  24/7 Technical Support. 
  Pre-configured and customisable packages. 
  NoVNC Console. 
  DDoS Mitigation in all locations.
  Instant Deployment.
